5178.verse: يُسَبِّحُ|Glorifies|71|77|10376$لِلَّهِ|Allah|51|63|6$مَا|whatever|82|94|262$فِى|(is) in|58|70|89$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|127|351$وَمَا|and whatever|111|123|46$فِى|(is) in|58|70|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the earth,|92|98|100$ٱلْمَلِكِ|the Sovereign,|117|159|9170$ٱلْقُدُّوسِ|the Holy,|93|177|16915$ٱلْعَزِيزِ|the All-Mighty,|118|202|3257$ٱلْحَكِيمِ|the All-Wise.|105|147|2939$

5179.verse: هُوَ|He|48|54|298$ٱلَّذِى|(is) the One Who|134|146|138$بَعَثَ|sent|64|76|2178$فِى|among|63|75|89$ٱلْأُمِّيِّــۧنَ|the unlettered|115|127|16916$رَسُولاً|a Messenger|103|115|1181$مِّنْهُمْ|from themselves|128|134|730$يَتْلُواْ|reciting|69|81|1182$عَلَيْهِمْ|to them|73|97|22$ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ|His Verses,|93|117|706$وَيُزَكِّيهِمْ|and purifying them|143|167|1186$وَيُعَلِّمُهُمُ|and teaching them|144|168|1184$ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ|the Book|85|97|451$وَٱلْحِكْمَةَ|and the wisdom|124|131|1185$وَإِن|although|77|92|213$كَانُواْ|they were|87|102|94$مِن قَبْلُ|before|92|106|250$لَفِى|surely in|75|90|1513$ضَلَـٰلٍ|an error|77|92|3468$مُّبِينٍ|clear.|66|73|3469$

5180.verse: وَءَاخَرِينَ|And others|112|118|7344$مِنْهُمْ|among them|101|113|730$لَمَّا يَلْحَقُواْ|who have not yet joined|182|194|16917$بِهِمْ‌ۚ|them;|59|71|125$وَهُوَ|and He|66|78|305$ٱلْعَزِيزُ|(is) the All-Mighty,|145|151|1187$ٱلْحَكِيمُ|the All-Wise.|105|105|343$

5181.verse: ذَٲلِكَ|That|64|79|28$فَضْلُ ٱللَّهِ|(is the) Bounty of Allah,|179|209|636$يُؤْتِيهِ|He gives it|90|120|3010$مَن|(to) whom|89|119|76$يَشَآءُ‌ۚ|He wills.|74|104|867$وَٱللَّهُ|And Allah|81|96|167$ذُو ٱلْفَضْلِ|(is the) Possessor of Bounty|208|402|995$ٱلْعَظِيمِ|the Great.|88|282|996$

5182.verse: مَثَلُ|(The) likeness|113|127|1869$ٱلَّذِينَ|(of) those who|119|148|20$حُمِّلُواْ|were entrusted|121|150|16918$ٱلتَّوْرَٮٰةَ|(with) the Taurat|136|165|2609$ثُمَّ|then|50|79|293$لَمْ|not|42|56|63$يَحْمِلُوهَا|they bore it,|103|121|16919$كَمَثَلِ|(is) like|70|106|137$ٱلْحِمَارِ|the donkey|94|130|16920$يَحْمِلُ|who carries|96|132|11618$أَسْفَارَۢا‌ۚ|books.|82|118|16921$بِئْسَ|Wretched is|99|117|8726$مَثَلُ|(the) example|112|119|1869$ٱلْقَوْمِ|(of) the people|120|135|2608$ٱلَّذِينَ|who|70|85|20$كَذَّبُواْ|deny|73|88|2650$بِـَٔـايَـٰتِ|(the) Signs|94|109|609$ٱللَّهِ‌ۚ|(of) Allah.|86|101|2$وَٱللَّهُ|And Allah|81|88|167$لَا|(does) not|90|140|30$يَهْدِى|guide|69|170|1270$ٱلْقَوْمَ|the people,|95|196|2316$ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ|the wrongdoers.|128|178|377$

5183.verse: قُلْ|Say,|50|60|765$يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ هَادُوٓاْ|`O you who are Jews!|188|208|16922$إِن|If|44|64|225$زَعَمْتُمْ|you claim|85|104|5852$أَنَّكُمْ|that you|77|96|1632$أَوْلِيَآءُ|(are) allies|90|110|5037$لِلَّهِ|of Allah.|74|84|6$مِن دُونِ|excluding|101|122|224$ٱلنَّاسِ|the people,|95|136|75$فَتَمَنَّوُاْ|then wish|84|125|893$ٱلْمَوْتَ|(for) the death,|125|166|894$إِن|if|44|85|225$كُنتُمْ|you are|70|91|214$صَـٰدِقِينَ|truthful.`|99|99|226$

5184.verse: وَلَا|But not|69|75|25$يَتَمَنَّوْنَهُۥٓ|they will wish for it,|151|163|16923$أَبَدَۢا|ever,|54|66|896$بِمَا|for what|76|88|43$قَدَّمَتْ|have sent forth|123|135|897$أَيْدِيهِمْ‌ۚ|their hands.|99|111|757$وَٱللَّهُ|And Allah|81|87|167$عَلِيمُۢ|(is) All-Knowing|123|331|307$بِٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ|of the wrongdoers.|146|354|898$

5178.verse: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth is exalting Allah, the Sovereign, the Pure, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

5179.verse: It is He who has sent among the unlettered a Messenger from themselves reciting to them His verses and purifying them and teaching them the Book and wisdom - although they were before in clear error -

5180.verse: And [to] others of them who have not yet joined them. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

5181.verse: That is the bounty of Allah, which He gives to whom He wills, and Allah is the possessor of great bounty.

5182.verse: The example of those who were entrusted with the Torah and then did not take it on is like that of a donkey who carries volumes [of books]. Wretched is the example of the people who deny the signs of Allah. And Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.

5183.verse: Say, "O you who are Jews, if you claim that you are allies of Allah, excluding the [other] people, then wish for death, if you should be truthful."

5184.verse: But they will not wish for it, ever, because of what their hands have put forth. And Allah is Knowing of the wrongdoers.

5185.verse: Say, "Indeed, the death from which you flee - indeed, it will meet you. Then you will be returned to the Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, and He will inform you about what you used to do."
